input.post_caption: Lili Reinhart is in her lover girl era ‚Äî and we love that for her.‚Å† ‚Å† Lili met her man on TikTok (after she saw a video of him making fun of 'Riverdale') and slid into his DMs. They've been IG official since 2023.‚Å† ‚Å† She tells Marie Claire that they're currently navigating the whole long-distance thing as an actor couple. (She just shot 'The Love Hypothesis,' he's starring in Mindy Kaling's new series.)‚Å† ‚Å† It's deeply hard on me to be apart from the person I love. I'm a very domestic woman, and I love to be at home and sit on my couch with my person and my dog; there's nothing that brings me greater joy than that specifically.‚Å† ‚Å† (üì∏: Getty Images, Lili Reinhart).

input.comment_text: Blake lively was the worst choice for lily anyways. I LOVED those books. I was so excited for the movie. Blake ruined it entirely. I liked Justin tho
input.post_caption: Colleen Hoover says the legal battle between Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively has tainted how she feels about her novel, 'It Ends With Us.'‚Å† ‚Å† I can't even recommend it anymore. I feel like [the lawsuit] has overshadowed it, the author tells ELLE magazine. I'm almost embarrassed to say I wrote it.‚Å† ‚Å† When people ask what I do, I'm just like, 'I'm a writer. Please don't ask me what I wrote.'‚Å† ‚Å† Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict feels like a circus and is all-around sad.‚Å† ‚Å† This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up.‚Å† ‚Å† Swipe for more from Colleen and head to the link in bio üîó to read her full interview with ELLE.‚Å† ‚Å† (üì∏: Getty Images, It Ends With Us).

Please don't ask me what I wrote.'‚Å† ‚Å† Colleen will be deposed for the case in a few weeks and says that Blake and Justin's ongoing conflict feels like a circus and is all-around sad.‚Å† ‚Å† This actually truly has impacted some of the actors' careers in huge ways... I'm just trying to stay removed from the negativity. I have my own story I could tell ‚Ä¶ but I don't want to bring attention to it, and I don't want to have to put someone else down to lift myself up.‚Å† ‚Å† Swipe for more from Colleen and head to the link in bio üîó to read her full interview with ELLE.‚Å† ‚Å† (üì∏: Getty Images, It Ends With Us).
